briefTitle: Evaluation of the Safety of Lubiprostone in Pediatric Participants Aged ≥ 6 Years to < 18 Years With Functional Constipation
officialTitle: A Multicenter, 6-month, Open-label Safety Study of Lubiprostone in Pediatric Subjects Aged ≥ 6 Years to < 18 Years With Functional Constipation
summary: A study of the safety of lubiprostone in pediatric participants aged ≥ 6 Years to \< 18 years diagnosed with functional constipation.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With at Least One Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
